messages.text: Hey there, I'm the assistant of the pharmacy. Who's there ?
Who's there? Hello, it's Hugo. How are you? Fine.

Hello Hugo, it's a pleasure to speak with you. I am doing well, thank you for asking.

Could you please tell me which company you are calling from? I'm here to discuss any new products, price changes, or updates on delivery times from our suppliers.
Hugo, it's a pleasure to speak with you. I am doing well. Thank you for asking. Ah shit, I didn't hear that.

Hello Hugo, it's a pleasure to speak with you. I am doing well, thank you for asking.

As an AI agent for the pharmacy, I'd like to ask if there are any new products you'd like to tell us about. Also, have there been any changes to your product pricing or delivery times recently?
Hello Hugo, it's a pleasure to speak with you. I am doing well. Thank you for asking.

Hello Hugo, it's a pleasure to speak with you too. I am doing well, thank you for asking.

As an AI agent for the pharmacy, I'd like to inquire about any new products you might have, any recent price changes, and your current delivery times.

Hello Hugo, it's a pleasure to speak with you too. I am doing well. Thank you for asking. He doesn't stop anymore... Yeah but this, during the live stream is really annoying. I know, so you have to wait until he finishes his sentence, right? Well if I restart I think he will be on the same conversation as before. Impossible. No you're right. Hello!

Hello Hugo, I am still here and ready to continue our conversation. I understand there might have been some confusion earlier.

As an AI for the pharmacy, I'm calling to inquire about any new products you might have, any changes in pricing, and your current delivery times.
